Ext.define('MyApp.view.MyFormViewController', {
    extend: 'Ext.app.ViewController',
    alias: 'controller.myform',

    onButtonClick: function(button, e, eOpts) {
        //window.location = 'http://localhost:8080/SpringBootRestApi/api/user/';
        //var form = button.up();
        //if (form.isValid()){


        var id = Ext.getCmp('id').getValue();
        var name = Ext.getCmp('name').getValue();
        var lastname = Ext.getCmp('lastname').getValue();
        //var radioActive = Ext.getCmp('radioActive').getValue();
        //var radioPassive = Ext.getCmp('radioPassive').getValue();


        var radios = document.getElementsByName('radiogroup');

for (var i = 0, length = radios.length; i < length; i++)
{
 if (radios[i].checked)
 {
  // do whatever you want with the checked radio
  console.log('Active');
  break;

  // only one radio can be logically checked, don't check the rest
 }else {
     console.log('Passive');
     break;

 }
}
        console.log(id);
        console.log(name);
        console.log(lastname);

       /* Ext.Ajax.request({
            url: "http://localhost:8080/SpringBootRestApi/api/user/",
            success: function (response) {
                Ext.Msg.alert("success", response.responseText);
            },
            failure: function () {
                Ext.Msg.alert("failure", "failed to load");
            },
           // params: {

           // }

        });

*/

        //}
    }

});
